'''Namai''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

A local basket-weaving roparu.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =
|none            = x
|other           =
}}

## Dialogue

* If [Governor Clario](/governorClario/) is dead
** ''"I say Clario will place blame on Ikawha for the death of this Rinco. Mokeha is foolish."''
* If [Ikawha](/stormSpeakerIkawha/) or [Mokeha](/mokeha/) is dead, or if you previously attacked [Sātahuzi](/satahuzi/)
** ''"We open our arms to you, and you slay our kin! Leave this place!"''
* If [Ikawha](/stormSpeakerIkawha/) isn't dead, and not during [Burning Bridges](/burningBridges/):
** If the Watcher is not a [island aumaua](/islandAumaua/) or has the Deadfire Archipelago culture
*** ''"A basket, sir/miss? To carry all sorts of things."''
** Otherwise
*** ''"Ekera, Hylea sends us many storms this season."''
*** ''"Other tribes never visit us. You came from very far?"'' (Never)
* If the player attacks the [Sātahuzi](/satahuzi/)
** ''"For what do you do this?! Leave us in peace!"''
* Unused dialogue
** ''"Amira's winds blow sweet upon you."''

[Category:Port Maje characters](/categoryPortMajeCharacters/)
[Category:Sātahuzi characters](/categorySatahuziCharacters/)
